our friend E.
Numbers act as abstract functions which slide the ridge to the space in its place with a
grace when they sum.
They slide, they don't slide.
Acting a second way, they rotate and dilate but keep straight this same plane.

Up and downs come around as turns round which is key.

is a turn halfway round.
This one, matched by none, turns this way and we're done.
